version_description:
National Trade Goods, War Coalitions & The Embassy!

- Collect 8 new National Trade Goods by defeating different Nations!
- Rebuild the Embassy to form powerful Coalitions with 8 different civilizations to gain a formidable edge in World War!

National Trade Goods, War Coalitions & The Embassy!

- Collect 8 new National Trade Goods by defeating different Nations!
- Rebuild the Embassy to form powerful Coalitions with 8 different civilizations to gain a formidable edge in World War!

v4.5 Great Leaders Update Notes

• Expand your civilization’s skills at the University with the help of Great Leaders like Leonardo DaVinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong, Sultan Saladin, and Suleiman the Magnificent!
• Italian and Turkish lan

v4.5 Great Leaders Update Notes

The v4.6 update of DomiNations has been released!

Victory Chest
• Battle daily, earn stars, get a BIG HUGE chest of rewards!

Library Techs, Missile Battery and a new General!
• Winston Churchill joins the Castle as a new General star

The v4.6 update of DomiNations has been released!

• Battle daily, earn stars, get a BIG HUGE chest of rewards!

Library Techs, Missile Battery and a new General!

The High Seas! v4.7 update of DomiNations has been released!

Expeditions
Go on overseas adventures to bring back rewards including new Troops and Blessings!

Armored Car, Sniper Tower, and more!

The Atomic Age! v5.0 update of DomiNations has been released!

Atomic Age
- Advance your civilization to the next age of history to acquire new troop and building upgrades!
- All New Helicopters can now be trained at the barracks!
- The APC

Gifts of Peace! v5.1 Update Notes

- It snowed in DomiNations! Wintry Gifts will appear on your town for all of December!
- Alliance Gifts show your Alliance how much you care! Specially marked purchases reward everyone in your Alliance with a gi

Gifts of Peace Hotfix! v5.1.1 Update Notes

- Fixes to allowing walls to be purchased for food or gold!

Check out the full list of improvements on the forums!

Strategies of War! v5.3 Update Notes

- Manage your Troop Tactics in a new building, the Stronghold
- Coalitions now come with unique Troops, and have been rebalanced
- Unlock the ability to research any two upgrades at the same time at the Bl

Strategies of War! v5.3 Update Notes

- Manage your Troop Tactics in a new building, the Stronghold
- Coalitions now come with unique Troops, and have been rebalanced
- Unlock the ability to research any two upgrades at the same time at the Bl

- Marco Polo now periodically visits your town to offer his wares!
- Challenge your Alliance members to practice battles to hone your strategy
- Research Amelia Earhart’s skill tree at the University to bolster your air force and oil economy!

DomiNations 2 Year Anniversary! v5.5.X Update Notes
-Fixes to remove air Troop Tactics after use!
-Fixes to allow War Bases to be selected for Friendly Challenges!
-Corrected a bug to prevent the overcharging of crowns when finishing University s

Join an Alliance! If you are not in an Alliance and your Alliance Gate is repaired, you may be sent an invitation to join a suggested Alliance.

DomiNations is 5 years old!

A month full of Events, Sales and amazing brand new content is on its way in April!
Improvements to how Events are run to streamline the process and make navigating Events easier.

Five Years of DomiNations v8.4
· Laws are coming to DomiNations!
· Build the new Parliament building to gain access to researching Laws.
· Work with the rest of your Alliance to research new Laws for your base and unlock some exciting new boosts

Call to Arms v8.5
• Balance changes coming to General Eisenhower Troops
• New Upgrade Levels to Digital Age buildings
• 5 new Digital Age Expedition Destinations
